name: Shuffleboard Master
description:
Shuffleboard Master is a game of skill. It's a realistic 3D simulation of the real table game.

You have full control over the puck - speed, direction, and point of release. That means it'll take some practice to play well. Hone your skill against the 7 levels of A.I. opponent as you advance from Beginner to Zen Master.

A.I. OPPONENTS
There are 7 levels of A.I. to beat. They get more accurate as you advance. They also get more aggressive, sometimes choosing to attack your pucks if it means taking the lead. You'll need a strategy to beat the Masters.

2-PLAYER WIFI GAME
You can play against a friend or nearby random stranger. Both of you need to have wifi turned on. (You don't need to be connected to a network - just have your wifi on.)

FUN STUFF
Motion Streaks • Fast moving pucks looks even faster.
Homing Pucks • Guide themselves toward your enemy.
Do-Overs • Re-throw your puck when you really need it.
Instant Replay • Re-live that game-winning shot again and again.
Pick Your Puck • Now, 5 designs to choose from!
Fast-Forward • For when that realistic friction is taking too long.

TIPS & TRICKS
From someone who's played more than 1,000 games...
• Lay your phone or iPad on a flat surface instead of holding in your hand
• Don't move it around while you play, especially don't twist it
• Fling your puck with a finger (not your thumb)
• Get your forearm and wrist in the game (not just your finger)
• Touch your puck, then drag it around a little before you fling it
• Don't just put your finger down and fling it immediately

I had a lot of fun making this game and play-testing it. I hope you like it too. Let me know at http://funnerware.com/feedback .
